*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Cable to Austin, June 26, 1827. Introducing William Calahan.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To Colonel Austin.*/p*
*p*Respected Sir, Tho I am only acquainted with you by reputation I take the liberty of addressing you a few lines desiring you to be so good as to write me concerning the situation of the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* you are forming on the *location_mentioned*Brazos */location_mentioned*I passed thro' that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*about *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">thre years ago*/date_mentioned* with *person_mentioned*Gen. Bernardo's family*/person_mentioned* and think it a fine country of land. I wish you to inform me of the conditions imposed upon the *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*Write to *person_mentioned*Pablo Willis J. Powell*/person_mentioned* Naturalista in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Willis J. Powell */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*the *date_mentioned n="06-24-1827">24th. of June 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al *person_mentioned*Señor Coronel Austin*/person_mentioned* en el *location_mentioned*Rio de los Brazos*/location_mentioned* en la *location_mentioned*Provincia de Texas*/location_mentioned*—. pr. el *location_mentioned*camino del Saltillo en Coahuila*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
